title: 咬紧牙关
desc:
We must try our best to bite the bullet and do a thing, Otherwise, we will achieve nothing.  （ Hitler ） 
—— 我们必须咬紧牙关，全力以赴去做一件事情；否则，我们将一事无成。  （ 希特勒 ）

title: 勇气
desc:
Courage is going from failure to failure without losing enthusiasm.  （ Churchill ） 
—— 勇气就是不断失败，而不丧失热情。  （ 丘吉尔 ）

title: 悲观主义者
desc:
We shall draw from the heart of suffering itself the means of inspiration and survival. 
—— 我们应从遭受苦难的心中获得呼吸、生存的方法。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
A pessimist sees the difficulty in every opportunity; an optimist sees the opportunity in every difficulty. 
—— 悲观主义者从每个机遇中看到困难，乐观主义者从每个困难中看到机遇。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Solitary trees, if they grow at all, grow strong. 
—— 孤独的树如果成长，就会成长得非常茁壮。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
History is written by the victors. 
—— 历史是由胜利者书写的。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Never leave that until tomorrow , which you can do today. 
—— 今天的事不要拖到明天。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Most folks are about as happy as they make up their minds to be. 
—— 对于大多数人来说，他们认定自己有多幸福，就有多幸福。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Where there is a will , there is a way. 
—— 有志者，事竟成。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Nothing is as important as passion. No matter what you want to do with your life, be passionate. 
—— 没有什么比热情更重要了，无论你想做什么，带着热情去做。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
I do not know anyone who has got to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but should get you pretty near. 
—— 我不知道有人能不努力就取得成功卓越，这就是方法，努力不会让你每次都获得成功卓越，但能让你更靠近它许多。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Man are disturbed not by things, but by the view which they take of them. 
—— 人们的困扰不是来自事情的本身，而是来自他们对事情的看法。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Defeat is not bitter unless you swallow it. 
—— 挫败并不痛苦，除非你接受它。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Life’s challenges are not supposed to paralyze you — they’re supposed to help you discover who you are. 
—— 人生的挑战不是要瘫痪你，而是帮你发现真实的你。

title: Kuriyama Mirai
desc:
Many of life’s failures are experienced by people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up. 
—— 很多人失败，因为他们不知道他们放弃时，距离成功是多么的近。

title: 不要害怕失败
desc:
There is no disgrace in honest failure; there is disgrace in fearing to fail. 
—— 坦率的失败并不丢脸，害怕失败才会丢脸。

title: 最美的花开
desc:
Life needs flowers and smiles, and you are the most beautiful flower in my life. 
—— 生活需要鲜花和微笑，而你是我生命中最美的花开。

title: 有你们陪伴
desc:
At this moment, my heart is filled with gratitude and joy, because you are with me. 
—— 此时此刻，心中充满感激和喜悦，因为有你们陪伴。

title: 一路同行
desc:
Every tiny moment tells a happy story, grateful to have you along the way. 
—— 每一个微小的瞬间都诉说着快乐的故事，感恩有你们一路同行。

title: 充满阳光和欢笑
desc:
May the world be brighter with beauty, and may your days be filled with sunshine and laughter. 
—— 愿世界因美好而更加绚烂，愿你们的每一天都充满阳光和欢笑。

title: 相遇和欢愉
desc:
Feel every bit of life with your heart, enjoy every encounter and joy. 
—— 用心感悟生活的点滴，享受每一次相遇和欢愉。

title: 阳光璀璨
desc:
No matter rain or shine, may your life be as bright as the sun. 
—— 不论风雨与晴天，都愿你们的人生都能如同阳光璀璨。

title: 创造美丽的回忆
desc:
Treat every moment with kindness, feel every sincere emotion, and create beautiful memories with you. 
—— 善待每一个瞬间，感受每一份真挚的情感，与你们共同创造美丽的回忆。

title: 色彩和温暖
desc:
With you around, all the days become full of color and warmth. 
—— 有你们在身边，所有的日子都变得充满了色彩和温暖。

title: 最美丽的旋律
desc:
Thank you for having you, every laughter is the most beautiful melody. 
—— 感恩有你们，每一次笑声都是最美丽的旋律。

title: 最亮丽的星辰
desc:
There are many precious moments in life, and you are the brightest of them all. 
—— 生命中有许多宝贵的瞬间，而你们就是其中最亮丽的星辰。
